meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed oxycodones for my back pain.
meanings.sent2: She keeps her oxycodones in a secure medicine cabinet.
meanings.sent3: The oxycodones seemed to dance in the bottle, tempting me with relief.
meanings.sent4: The effect of the oxycodones was like a gentle hug, easing the ache away.
meanings.sent5: The bright label on the oxycodones bottle reminded me of the hope they brought.

meanings.sent1: The pharmacy ran out of oxycodones, so I had to wait for a new shipment.
meanings.sent2: He counted the oxycodones in the bottle to make sure none were missing.
meanings.sent3: The oxycodones rolled off the table and scattered like marbles on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The oxycodones in her hand were a symbol of the pain relief to come.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the oxycodones filled the room, promising comfort and calm.
